restart_prompt: Changing the language requires a restart. Restart now?
headphone_info_tooltip: This output is what you will hear. It mixes both instrumental and vocals. Ensure both selected devices have the same sample rate.
virtual_info_tooltip: This output should be captured by streaming software (like OBS). Typically it's a virtual audio cable (e.g., VB-CABLE). It outputs only the instrumental track.
lufs_info_tooltip:
LUFS (Loudness Units Full Scale) is an international standard for measuring perceived loudness.
Enabling this feature will automatically adjust the overall loudness to the selected target, ensuring consistent levels across songs, which is particularly useful for streaming.
explorer_info_tooltip: The file explorer only lists common audio formats (e.g., wav, mp3, flac, m4a, aac, ogg, opus, wma). Some files may not appear if they are encoded in uncommon formats or corrupt.
player_info_tooltip: For best quality, ensure that the instrumental and vocal files have the same sample rate and length, and that they are aligned (synchronized).
gpu_info_tooltip:
GPU (graphics processing unit) acceleration can speed up the vocal separation models. If supported and enabled in settings, the GPU will be used.
If GPU is unavailable or disabled, the CPU will be used, which may be slower.
save_to_explorer_checkbox_label: Save separated files to the selected file explorer folder
hop_length_tooltip:
hop_length: number of samples to shift the analysis window.
Larger values reduce computation but decrease time resolution.
segment_size_tooltip:
segment_size: the length of audio chunks processed by the model at one time.
Larger values make processing more stable but require more memory.
overlap_tooltip:
overlap: overlap ratio between segments (0.0‚Äì0.99).
Higher values reduce stitching artifacts but slow down processing.
batch_size_tooltip:
batch_size: number of segments processed at once.
Larger values can speed up processing but require more memory.
select_valid_folder_msg: Please select a valid folder first.
latest_version_msg: You are already using the latest version.
about_text: Need instrumental backing for live singing but don't want the audience to hear the original vocals? This small program is made just for you! It integrates HQ AI vocal separation, dual-track player, key shifting, loudness normalization and more!
about_subtext: This is my first program and may have bugs. Feel free to follow me and provide feedback!
